name: Scootin' Cubes
description:
Scootin’ Cubes – Puzzle

Speed your cubes along this specially designed track-way, but beware not all tracks will support your cube. You will need to match the colour of your cube to the track in order to pass. Red to red and blue to blue. To make it harder you cube can change colour.


Controls.

Keyboard:

‘A’ or left arrow – Shift left. ‘D’ or right arrow – Shift right.

SPACE to jump

‘P’ pause and unpause game. ESCAPE pause and quit.

 

Gamepad

Left stick – shift left Right stick – shift right

‘A’ – Jump

‘start’ – pause and unpause ‘menu’ – pause and quit.
